thread.title: Google Docs for Android Updated with Research Tool, Voice Typing, More
thread.title_full: Google Docs for Android Updated with Research Tool, Voice Typing, More - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Google Docs for Android Updated with Research Tool, Voice Typing, More
text: Google has just announced that its Docs application for Android devices has just received a major update that adds quite a lot of new features and improvements. According to the search giant, the new feature will be rolling out to Google Docs users worldwide beginning today. Those who already have the application installed on their smartphones should check for the later update... Â»
